overview:
As Co-Founder and CTO, Chad Mallory oversees all facets of product development and product management.

Prior to BrightWhistle, Chad founded Nexteppe, a retail marketing platform for automotive dealers. As Co-Founder and CTO, Chad created the Nexteppe product platform and continued to manage all aspects of product development, making Nexteppe one of the fastest growing automotive marketing platform providers in the industry.

Chad studied industrial engineering at Georgia Tech. Chad and his wife, Sarah, live in Flowery Branch.
